front.title: Certification of standard reference material 968f fat-soluble vitamins in frozen human serum
front.abstract: Standard Reference Material (SRM) 968f is intended for use in validating methods for determining fat soluble vitamins in human serum and plasma and value assigning in house produced control materials analyzed using those methods. A unit of SRM 968f consists of one vial each of two concentration levels of frozen human serum. This publication documents the production, analytical methods, and statistical evaluations involved in realizing this product.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
